metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9519 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In easelcomm_hw_build_scatterlist, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System privileges required. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-69808833.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
